statements: SELECT * FROM protein_secondary_structure;
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT protein_name FROM protein_secondary_structure;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE secondary_structure LIKE '%alpha helix%';
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_id = 1
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_id > 3
SELECT * FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE secondary_structure LIKE '%alpha helix%'
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE secondary_structure LIKE '%beta sheet%' ORDER BY protein_id ASC
SELECT protein_id, secondary_structure FROM protein_secondary_structure WHERE protein_name = 'MyProtein'
SELECT * FROM protein_information;
SELECT protein_name, sequence FROM protein_information WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM researcher_information WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM protein_information WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researcher_information ORDER BY institution DESC;
SELECT * FROM protein_information WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT sequence, secondary_structure FROM protein_information WHERE protein_name = 'My Protein';
SELECT * FROM researcher_information WHERE institution = 'University of Science';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researcher_information WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT protein_name, sequence, secondary_structure FROM protein_information WHERE protein_id = 3;
SELECT id, name FROM proteins;
SELECT * FROM secondary_structures WHERE structure_type = 'Helix';
SELECT id, name, sequence FROM proteins WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM secondary_structures WHERE start_position < 50 ORDER BY end_position DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, name, sequence FROM proteins WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM secondary_structures WHERE structure_type = 'alpha helix' ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, name, sequence FROM proteins WHERE name LIKE '%alpha%' AND sequence LIKE '%beta%';
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure;
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT location_description, latitude, longitude FROM Protein_Locations WHERE protein_id = 5;
SELECT protein_name, structure_type, resolution FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure JOIN Structures ON Protein_Secondary_Structure.protein_id = Structures.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT protein_name, secondary_structure FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure WHERE secondary_structure = 'Alpha Helix';
SELECT protein_name, location_description, latitude, longitude FROM Protein_Secondary_Structure JOIN Protein_Locations ON Protein_Secondary_Structure.protein_id = Protein_Locations.protein_id;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, structure_type FROM Researcher JOIN Structures ON Researcher.researcher_id = Structures.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM Researcher
SELECT name, email FROM Researcher
SELECT id, name FROM Protein
SELECT * FROM ProteinStructure
SELECT protein1_id, protein2_id, interaction_type FROM ProteinInteraction
SELECT * FROM Researcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Researcher ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Protein.name, Protein.sequence, Researcher.name AS researcher_name FROM Protein JOIN Researcher ON Protein.researcher_id = Researcher.id;
SELECT SecondaryStructure.type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM SecondaryStructure JOIN ProteinStructure ON SecondaryStructure.id = ProteinStructure.ss_id GROUP BY SecondaryStructure.type;

SELECT Protein1.name AS protein1_name, Protein2.name AS protein2_name, ProteinInteraction.interaction_type FROM ProteinInteraction JOIN Protein AS Protein1 ON ProteinInteraction.protein1_id = Protein1.id JOIN Protein AS Protein2 ON ProteinInteraction.protein2_id = Protein2.id;
